edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.gui.container

Class JanewayKeyEventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.gui.container.JanewayKeyEventDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher

    public class JanewayKeyEventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher
    This class calls the edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.gui.widgets.KeyboardShortcut#processKeyEvent(KeyEvent) method for each KeyboardShortcut in the active tab.

    • Field Summary

      The list of shortcuts used globally by all modules
      protected JanewayFrame mainWindow
      The main Janeway frame
      protected java.util.List<IJanewayModule> modules
      The list of modules that were loaded at runtime
      protected boolean windowsKeyDown
      A flag representing the state of the windows key

    • Method Detail

      • dispatchKeyEvent

        public boolean dispatchKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent event)
        Dispatches the given key event to the active tab.
        Specified by:
        dispatchKeyEvent in interface java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher
        Returns:
        true if the event was dispatched, false if the event should be handled by the next dispatcher. IMPORTANT: if you don't want the default action to occur for a shortcut, you must consume the event and then return true.

      • addGlobalKeyboardShortcut

        public void addGlobalKeyboardShortcut(KeyboardShortcut shortcut)
        Adds the given shortcut to the list of global shortcuts for the Janeway client.
        Parameters:
        shortcut - the new keyboard shortcut to add

      • isWindowsKeyUp

        private boolean isWindowsKeyUp(java.awt.event.KeyEvent event)
        Maintains the state of the windowsKeyDown flag.
        Parameters:
        event - the last keye vent
        Returns:
        false if the windows key is pressed, otherwise true

        Sets the value of the windows key flag

        value - the new value of the flag
